definition[0]: a large area of flat land that is higher than the land around it
definition[1]: a period during which the level of something does not change, especially after a period when it was increasing
example[0]: Inflation rates have reached a plateau.
definition[2]: if something plateaus, it reaches and then stays at a particular level
example[1]: The athletic footwear market has not yet plateaued.
definition[3]: a period during which the level of something does not change, especially after it has been increasing
example[2]: The rate of inflation has reached a plateau.
